Name: Testing requirements for solar photovoltaic systems.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to testing requirements for solar photovoltaic systems.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1. Section 27-3025 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by deleting the following:
[ARTICLE 690
Solar Photovoltaic Systems
SECTION 690.1
Section 690.1 - At the end of the section add the following:
Solar Photovoltaic Systems shall be tested as a complete assembly by a nationally recognized laboratory. These systems shall be listed or labeled after completion of testing.]
	Â§ 2. This local law shall take effect sixty days after enactment.

JTB
LS #6031
11/5/08
